articles.title: Joint communique on opening of DPRK-Italy diplomatic relations
articles.content:
Joint communique on opening of DPRK-Italy diplomatic relations 
    Pyongyang, January 5 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea and the Republic of Italy decided on January 4, Juche 89 (2000) to establish diplomatic relations at ambassadorial level on the principle of mutual respect for sovereignty and equality.
